The shuttle cock is too light and does not reach the other side of the court sometimes even when hitting at full power. The base came off in 15-20 minutes of playing. Whereas we can play with Yonex shuttlecock for a month before it breaks. Even after gluing the base to the skirt [this also increased the weight and made it more playable], the base got compressed and the skirt broke off after 2 days.
